create.discardQuestion: Are you sure you want to discard changes on this page?
create.discardOtherQuestion: Are you sure you want to discard changes on this page? Any other information added in previous pages for this record will be retained.
create.exit: Are you sure you want to discard all the information for this record and exit?

heading.organization: Tell us a bit about your organization!
heading.organizationDescription: We will share this information with other service providers to make them aware of your services!
heading.locations: Tell us where your services are located
heading.locationsDescription: This will help partners make better referrals. You can add multiple locations covering all your services.
heading.services: Tell us more about the services you offer
heading.servicesDescription: This will help partners make better referrals. You can add multiple services from all locations.

record.deactivateQuestion: Are you sure you want to deactivate this record?
record.deactivateClaimedQuestion: Are you sure you want to deactivate this record? If you deactivate this record, no other organization will be able to find this record, and no one else will be able to claim it. If you owned this record in error and want to make it available for others to claim, please use the 'Unclaim' button instead of the 'Deactivate' button.
record.discardQuestion: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
record.unclaimQuestion: Are you sure you want to unclaim this record?

record.unclaimWithReferralsQuestion:

record.unclaimWithCheckInsAndReferralsQuestion:
You have checked in {{ checkInsCount }} time(s) and have {{ referralsCount }} connected referrals.
Are you sure you want to unclaim this record?
